```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
x <- 1:5
for (val in x) {
if (val == 3){
break
}
print(val)
}
```

```{R}
Loop <- function()
  
{number <- 0
	repeat {number <- number + 1
		if(number > 5)
		{break}
		print(paste("Number = ", number))
	}
}

Loop()
```
